definitions.definition: Barbarea vulgaris ( garden yellowrocket ), a biennial herb native to Europe .
Any plant of the Cardamine genus , especially Cardamine bulbosa and Cardamine hirsuta .

main_definition: Barbarea vulgaris ( garden yellowrocket ), a biennial herb native to Europe .
secondary_definitions: Any plant of the Cardamine genus , especially Cardamine bulbosa and Cardamine hirsuta .
